title: Adventures
creator_credit: Michael Rubbo, Nicholas Balla and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The story of a little raccoon who encounters many adventures when he strays from home to explore the world around him. The raccoon and all the other creatures in the film are real but are given voices by a little girl and her father. The situations are all natural and amusing. Suitable for very young children.
